articles.title: Griner says interpreter translated only part of her answers at airport interrogation - CBC Sports
articles.description: The drug trial of American basketball star Brittney Griner resumed Wednesday in a Russian court with Griner testifying that a language interpreter provided during her questioning translated only a fraction of what was said.
articles.content: American basketball star Brittney Griner testified at her drug possession trial in Russia that an interpreter translated only a fraction of what was said during questioning when she was detained at M… [+5173 chars]

articles.title: In fighting gun crime, Canada has an American problem - Reuters
articles.description: A Texas man bought dozens of guns from licensed dealers in the state before illegally reselling at least 16, U.S. officials say. Twelve were traced to crimes committed in America. The other four were traced to crimes in Canada.
articles.content: OTTAWA/TORONTO, July 27 (Reuters) - A Texas man bought dozens of guns from licensed dealers in the state before illegally reselling at least 16, U.S. officials say. Twelve were traced to crimes commi… [+8524 chars]

articles.title: S&P/TSX composite down as Shopify decline weighs on technology sector - CTV News
articles.description: North American markets ended the trading day in the red, with a double-digit decline in Shopify Inc. weighing on the technology sector of Canada's main stock exchange and U.S. stock markets sank ahead of Wednesday's scheduled interest rate decision from the U…
